key.name: file_description
key.value: You should upload file with extension of .txt and encoding of utf-8. This file should be exported from excel. Headers are email, name and mobile.

key.name: admin_settings_title
key.value: Admin users import settings

key.name: import_successfully
key.value: Import users successfully

key.name: email_exist
key.value: User with email of {$email} exist. So this user can not be add again.

key.name: email_invalid
key.value: Email of User {$email} is not valid. So this user can not be add again.

key.name: mobile_exist
key.value: User with mobile of {$mobile} exist. So this user can not be add again.

key.name: line_error
key.value: Line of {$line} has empty or incorrect.

key.name: email_subject
key.value: Your account has been created in {$site_name}

key.name: email_description
key.value:
You can login into {$site_name} using username of {$username} and password of {$password}.
Link: {$site_name}

key.name: mobile_description
key.value: Your account in {$site_name} with username: {$username} and password: {$password} created. Link: {$site_url}

key.name: error_import_extension
key.value: File type is incorrect. you should use .txt types.

key.name: file_empty
key.value: You should upload the file.

key.name: frmsms_plugin_not_active
key.value: Plugin of frmsms is not activated or installed. You can not use mobile data and sms not sent.

key.name: saved_successfully
key.value: Saved successfully.

key.name: notification_type
key.value: Type of notification to users

key.name: email_type
key.value: Email

key.name: mobile_type
key.value: Sms

key.name: all_type
key.value: All

key.name: notification_description
key.value: Before uploading the file, please select the type of notification to users and press Save button

key.name: resend_to_user_sleepy_label
key.value: Create new password and resend account information to users that not login yet.

key.name: resend_to_user_sleepy_description
key.value: Using this bottom, you can resend account information to users that not login yet.

key.name: resend_successfully
key.value: All account sent successfully.

key.name: empty_sleepy_users
key.value: All users login once.

key.name: upload_file_submit_label
key.value: Upload file

key.name: save_setting_submit_label
key.value: Save setting

key.name: notification_desc_notice
key.value: Notice: When "login with sms" plugin is installed, no account will be created and just an sms will be sent to users. Therefore this setting will be overseen.

key.name: default_approve_users_label
key.value: don't need admin verification

key.name: ignore_auto_username_password
key.value: Ignore auto creating username and password (username will be column 1 and password will be column 3)
